Company: ADP, Facebook, Gmail, LinkedIn, Twitter, Yahoo, YouTube
Description of incident: A breach that involved keylogging software affected at least 93,000 websites.  The virus may have originated on a server located in the Netherlands.  It first started collecting passwords and usernames on October 21. Approximately 860 computers in the United States were affected. More than 99% of the computers that were affected were outside of the United States.
